tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
    genetic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50),
    gene_variant VARCHAR(100),
    gene_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE genetic_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    dna_sequence TEXT,
    mutation_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    research_area VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE gene_variant (
    variant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    variant_type VARCHAR(50),
    effect VARCHAR(100),
    allele_frequency FLOAT
);
